title: Store wont let me buy with IP
body: I've been grinding to be able to afford Fizz with IP. Then when I finally have 4800 IP the store will not let me purchase him. I click on him and it says i do not have enough IP and it does this for all the champs of that price. It will let me buy the ones that cost less but not those. I am very confused and frustrated please help.

replies.body:
This bug occasionally pops up with the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by launching into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen so you can continue to make you purchase normally inside the old client.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
